feed.title: Carla Perez-Martinez Research Laboratory
feed.subtitle: Fabrication with Ionic Liquid Ion Sources

entry.title: FABILIS presentations at the European FIB Network

link.title: FABILIS presentations at the European FIB Network

entry.content: Aydin gave a talk on “Optimisation of Charged Particle Optics with the Differential Algebra Method” and Shaun presented a poster on “Ion Implantation into Semiconductors using Ionic Liquid Ion Sources”
entry.summary: Aydin gave a talk on “Optimisation of Charged Particle Optics with the Differential Algebra Method” and Shaun presented a poster on “Ion Implantation into Semiconductors using Ionic Liquid Ion Sources”

entry.title: Alex presents at EIPBN
entry.content: Alex Storey gave a talk on “Utilizing single species ionic liquid ion source beams for material irradiation” at the International Cofnerence on Electron, Ion and Photon Beam Technology and Nanofabrication, well done!
entry.summary: Alex Storey gave a talk on “Utilizing single species ionic liquid ion source beams for material irradiation” at the International Cofnerence on Electron, Ion and Photon Beam Technology and Nanofabrication, well done!

entry.title: Early Career Award at EIPBN
entry.content: Carla was recognised with the 2025 Early Career Award of the International Conference on Electron, Ion, Photon Beam Technology and Nanofabrication in Savannah, GA.
entry.summary: Carla was recognised with the 2025 Early Career Award of the International Conference on Electron, Ion, Photon Beam Technology and Nanofabrication in Savannah, GA.
